extendedIngredients.name: canned beets
extendedIngredients.original: 1 (16 ounce) can sliced beets, drained with liquid reserved
extendedIngredients.originalName: sliced beets, drained with liquid reserved

extendedIngredients.name: tart apple
extendedIngredients.original: 1 tart green apple, peeled and sliced
extendedIngredients.originalName: tart green apple, peeled and sliced

title: Beets
summary: Beets requires around 25 minutes from start to finish. One serving contains 111 calories, 1g of protein, and 0g of fat. This recipe serves 4. For 58 cents per serving, this recipe covers 4% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 1 person were impressed by this recipe. It is brought to you by Allrecipes. If you have lemon juice, beets, cornstarch, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. Only a few people really liked this side dish. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free and vegan diet. Overall, this recipe earns a not so spectacular spoonacular score of 22%. If you like this recipe, you might also like recipes such as Harvard Beets (Sweet Sour Red Beets), Star Anise Ginger Pickled Beets {+ Kimchi Pickled Beets}, and Please Try These Beets.
instructions: In a large skillet over medium heat, combine 1/2 cup of the beet liquid, lemon juice, salt, brown sugar and cornstarch; mix well.  Cook, stirring, until thickened and clear.  Stir in beets and apple.  Reduce heat to low and gently simmer for 15 minutes.                                                Kitchen-Friendly View

steps.step: In a large skillet over medium heat, combine 1/2 cup of the beet liquid, lemon juice, salt, brown sugar and cornstarch; mix well.  Cook, stirring, until thickened and clear.  Stir in beets and apple.  Reduce heat to low and gently simmer for 15 minutes.
